lines.text: Well, the Injuns were gettin' the best of the ordeal, 'til one of'em pulled a boner.
And that's the story of Priscilla and Miles Standish.
[sits back in his chair, lights his pipe and puffs]
And if that ain't the truth, I hope lightnin' strikes me!
[a huge bolt of lightning strikes the house. Grandpa is hanging from a rafter]
Anyhow, that's the way I heard it.
